details.Description: Supplier of airport ground equipment and transport vehicles intended to facilitate and enhance aviation-based ground operations. The company offers a wide range of aircraft crash rescue and recovery systems including firefighting trucks and equipment; along with safety and security equipment and accessories for a variety of purposes, enabling airport authorities to purchase quality ground operation machinery and spare parts.
Address: Offices G10 and 610, Al Asmawi Building

details.Description: Designer and manufacturer of menswear intended to redefine men's fashion with innovation. The company's product catalog includes shorts, briefs, tanks, thongs, boxers, vests and other apparel, which are made from soft fabric that controls bad odor and thermoregulating vests made from bamboo, enabling users to enjoy their desired comfort.
